attributes.action: include small-scale nuclear power plant in the Government's energy policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The only new nuclear power plant currently authorized in Britain is large-scale plant using Pressurized Water Reactors (PWR) or Boiling Water Reactors (BWR). There would be many advantages in using small-scale plant, such as Gas Turbine Modular Helium Reactors (GTMHR). These include: faster construction times, greater flexibility to respond to load changes and wider opportunities for Combined Heat and Power (CHP).
